title: Backend Engineer (Python)
jd: We are seeking a Backend Engineer with experience in Python, REST APIs, SQL databases (Postgres), working knowledge of cloud services and microservices architecture. Responsibilities: build and maintain REST APIs, write unit tests, debug and optimize performance. Skills: Python, Flask / FastAPI, SQL, Docker.

title: QA Engineer
jd: QA engineer responsible for automation and manual testing, experience in Selenium, Cypress, test-case design, API testing, and familiarity with CI/CD pipelines.
